name: GotHands?
description:
The combat prototype for Got Hands? This is a recreation of kung-fu master with souls-like combat. when this is complete it will be a procedural generated dungeon diver. There are still a few bugs and i will be updating as I fix the Bugs. the vs mode is currently disabled, parrying is currently disabled, and the skill system is also currently disabled. Right now windows only

this game is insanely difficult in its current state.
